verbs.description: [ARG1: Johnson] [V: became] [ARG2: a political independent] [ARGM-TMP: two years ago] [ARGM-TMP: when it became apparent the Republican Party was embracing Trump as its presidential nominee] .
Johnson became a political independent [ARGM-TMP: two years ago] [R-ARGM-TMP: when] it [V: became] [ARG2: apparent] [ARG1: the Republican Party was embracing Trump as its presidential nominee] .
Johnson became a political independent two years ago when it became apparent the Republican Party [V: was] embracing Trump as its presidential nominee .
Johnson became a political independent two years ago when it became apparent [ARG0: the Republican Party] was [V: embracing] [ARG1: Trump] [ARGM-PRD: as its presidential nominee] .
